data.title: Eye For Film: Search
data.text:
Growing pains and gains Saulė Bliuvaitė on developing and shooting Golden Leopard winner Toxic

Taking back power Lucía Forner Segarra on reinventing the revenge film in Berta

'I think a country without movies is a country without memory' César Díaz on bringing Mexico 86 to the screen

Groundbreaking Stephen Soucy on James Ivory, Ismail Merchant, Ruth Prawer Jhabvala, Richard Robbins and Merchant Ivory

A piece of cake Yasuda Jun’ichi on sweetness and keeping it real in A Samurai In Time

David Byrne designs 62nd NYFF poster Iconic image captures the cinema experience

More news and features

We're bringing you news and reviews from the Venice Film Festival.

We're looking forward to the Toronto International Film Festival, the Cheltenham International Film Festival and Fantastic Fest.

We've recently covered Frightfest, the Edinburgh International Film Festival, the Locarno Film Festival, the Fantasia International Film Festival, the Karlovy Vary International Film Festival, Frameline48, Docs Ireland, Sheffield DocFest and the Tribeca Film Festival.

Read our full archive for more.

Visit our festivals section.
